title: Butter Chicken
directions: Cut off the skin from the chicken and discard. Cut into bite­ sized pieces and put into a ziploc bag. Add in plain yogurt, curry powder, paprika and salt. Refrigerate for at least one hour.
Melt butter in a frying pan and saute the minced garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add in extra curry powder. Give it a quick mix, then add your canned tomatoes. Continue cooking on high until boiling. Add the bay leaf and turn the heat down to low. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Add in your marinated chicken and cook for another 10 minutes or until chicken is fully cooked.
Add heavy cream, sugar and salt to taste. Simmer for 1­2 minutes. Serve with some cream and chopped parsley if desired.
